## PlayerEventPayloads."PLAYER.RECONNECTED\_WORLD" property

Emitted when a player reconnects to a world after a disconnect.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerEvent.RECONNECTED_WORLD]: {
        player: Player;
        world: World;
    };
```
